Job Description:
Job Description
- Responsible for scheduling service camp and coaching.
- Responsible and supervision for maintenance all company products.
- Responsible for set up service center and service tool.
- Responsible for part warranty and claim.
- Understanding how to make failure report.
- Set up the warranty policy or service policy.
- Ensure customers are satisfaction with service policy.
- Management of motorcycle mechanic.
- Manage all materials for service department.
- Manage all motorcycles installation in the service department.
- Manage all service department tasks.
- Do as leader and staff management.
- Must be willing to travel and meet customers.
- Do other task as assign by top management level.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements 
- Working experiences up to 4 years 
- PC skills are required. Well versed in MS office suite.
- BBA or MBA, related to mechanic. Must speak English and fluent Khmer. 
- Minimum 4 years experiences in an international organization in motorcycle mechanic. Automotive industry experience is an advantage.
- Persons with prior work experience in Cambodia will be given preference. 
- Passionate about motorcycles.
- Must be knowledge about motorcycle assembly.
- Need person who has willing to be success.
- Position is open only for Cambodians.

Contact Detail
pisey@viparauto.asia, virat@viparauto.asia
Company Profile: Hanuman Auto Trading (Vipar Auto FZCO) was founded in 2013 with its headquarters in Jebel Ali Free Zone, Dubai as exclusive distributer and sourcing partner for Bajaj Auto Ltd. Today the company has trading and manufacturing operations in Cambodia, Myanmar, Indonesia, China and Singapore. Our partners include Bajaj Auto Ltd, Studds Helmets, CEAT, Repsol Lubricants, and Mango Finance.
